DataElement.preferredName: Relationship Tissue Donor HLA Typing Specimen Laboratory Submission Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the related donor typing was sent to the lab.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Relationship Tissue Donor HLA Typing Specimen Laboratory Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products._Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Relationship Tissue Donor HLA Typing Specimen
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.:Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.:A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Concepts.definition: A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.
Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.
A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products.:Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

Concepts.definition: A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products.
Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.
